tool_description:
SmrtX provides an API (Application Programming Interface) for patient preliminary medical diagnosis that can help you implement an intelligent symptom checker and Lab Test analyzer for your healthcare medical application.
When you incorporate Diagnosis API within your healthcare web-application it will have the same functionalities like presented in DDxHub Diagnosis System (https://ddxhub.azurewebsites.net/). This is an alive example of implementation.
name: Diagnosis
title: Diagnosis

api_list.name: GET /GetTests/
api_list.description: Returns all tests as JSON format in TestType datatype
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://diagnosis.p.rapidapi.com/api/DDxItems/GetTests?AuthenticationID=DEMO_AuthenticationID"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "diagnosis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET /GetCategories/
api_list.description: Returns all Symptom Categories (Breathing, Muscles, Blood and so on) as JSON format, List of Strings
api_list.code:

api_list.name: GET /GetSymptoms/

api_list.name: GET /GetPanels/
api_list.description: Returns all panels (groups of tests) as JSON format, List of Strings
